why are the ranked queues still available to play if the season is over

> [{quoted}](name=RANGAMAN27,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=sKseXILj,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-11T03:00:40.119+0000)
>
> why are the ranked queues still available to play if the season is over

Between seasons is preseason - during which there's generally a bunch of larger-scale changes to the game that couldn't occur during a normal season due to their level of impact. 

Ranked is still available during preseason - and you can still promote as you would during the season, but it won't impact your rewards for the 2015 Season, and you'll still have to go through the normal provisional process when the next season starts.
Im currently at silver elo. Lets say that i got to mid Gold during the preseason, during my provisionals, will i be counted as a Gold player or a Silver player?
The soft reset at the start of each season uses your ranking at the beginning of that season rather than at the end of the last.

Umm,  hi,  I made gold last season but this season stuck in silver, are borders supposed to change downwards ?  I  thought you kept your highest achieved border ?
Well you don't belong in gold tier so why would you deserve gold border..

Because I have solo achieved gold 3 times,  I thought once you got to a tier border at end of a season you would keep that tier border. This season I had some issues that kept me yo-yoing up and down in silver.  

Another reason it  makes sense for people to keep the border of the highest division they have achieved is to stop people getting their friends to carry their account to diamond/plat to get the borders every season if they only have to carry them once and they get the border forever it  would decrease the amount of  smurfing
